arStrings.szText:
Electrically charge an enemy causing it to deal {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} damage to themselves and {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} additional {if:SF_26}enemies{else}enemy{/if} each second over {c_number}[{SF_1}+{SF_13}]{/c} seconds.

If the enemy is killed, {c_important}Tempest{/c} spreads to another enemy gaining {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} additional seconds and {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%x|]{/c} bonus damage. These bonuses are also applied if {c_important}Tempest{/c} is reapplied onto the same enemy.
Acquired by defeating Heralds in Arcane Tremors
